content:
Hi!
I was thinking about creating an issue about setting a limit of files (number) per dataset as we encounter issues on large datasets, but it feels that there already have been a discussion on the matter.
Does anyone knows of an existing issue or thread, in order to avoid creating a duplicate?
Hmm, the closest I could find was this one: Limit the amount of data depositors may upload every dayÂ #7829
Please feel free to created a dedicated issue.
"This setting controls the number of files that can be uploaded through the UI at once. The default is 1000."
